text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to advise that the Cease and Desist (C&D) letter should formally demand a written undertaking from the competitor to preserve all relevant documents related to the infringement. The candidate answer's section on the C&D letter structure lists demands such as 'Immediately cease all use,' 'Remove all infringing materials,' 'Provide written confirmation of compliance,' and 'Provide compensation for damages,' but it fails to explicitly mention the crucial demand for a written undertaking to preserve evidence (document preservation notice).", "criterion_id": "d4857896-d1ee-4f61-84ed-188126600047"}
